title: 10g Slow Pour Single Stream
preparation_steps: Add coffee to V60 and tare scale

brewing_steps.audio_script: Start timer. Pour 30 grams for the bloom. Wait 30 seconds. Simple start.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inicia el cronómetro. Vierte 30 gramos para el bloom. Espera 30 segundos. Inicio simple.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Now, for the main event. Pour the remaining 140 grams in one, single, ultra-slow continuous stream. This should take you about 2 minutes of pouring. Keep the stream thread-thin.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Ahora, el evento principal. Vierte los 140 gramos restantes en un flujo continuo ultra-lento. Esto debería tomarte unos 2 minutos. Mantén el flujo muy fino.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Once you reach 170 grams, let it draw down. The continuous flow maintains a constant temperature and saturation.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Una vez alcances 170 gramos, déjalo drenar. El flujo continuo mantiene temperatura y saturación constantes.

what_to_expect.description: A counter-intuitive but effective method for micro-doses. Using one extremely slow, continuous pour (osmotic flow style) keeps the bed perfectly stable and fully saturated, preventing both clogging and bypass.
what_to_expect.audio_script: It feels wrong, but it works. By pouring in one ultra-slow, continuous stream, you maintain perfect saturation and temperature without agitating the bed, resulting in a sweet, unclogged brew.
what_to_expect.description_es: Un método simple que enfatiza la claridad. El vertido lento permite que cada partícula contribuya uniformemente a la taza final.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Este método de vertido lento es simple pero efectivo. El flujo lento produce una taza limpia con excelente claridad.

notes: Counterintuitive but works: one ultra-slow pour prevents bypass and clogging better than multiple fast pours with small doses.
notes_es: Método de vertido único y lento para máxima claridad.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 10g de café a molienda media.
